description:
1 Bedroom Apt with full living room (unfurnished, only coffee table), big kitchen and 1 full bathroom. 

1 extra inflatable bed 

Less than a block away from:

Costco
Marshalls
Pet Co
Mount Sinai
Applebees

. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and big groups. There is a big space in the living room, and for $30 you can buy a queen inflatable bed in Target
name: Whole Apartment for Christmas and New Years in NY!
review: Alvaro was a great host,  he was available all the time for any questions we had and the place was clean and very close to department stores. Definitely renting it again for our next trip to NYC.
